jerklib.util

Class Colors

  • java.lang.Object
    • jerklib.util.Colors

  • public final class Colors
extends java.lang.Object
    To use: channel.say(Colors.BLUE + "HELLLLO");
    Will say hello in blue
    Author:
    mohadib
